snippet: A violent storm formed over the prairie west of Oklahoma City late Friday afternoon, dropped a tornado in a suburb and rolled into Oklahoma City just south of downtown.
lead_paragraph: A violent storm formed over the prairie west of Oklahoma City late Friday afternoon, dropped a tornado in a suburb and rolled into Oklahoma City just south of downtown.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Storm-Struck Area Is Hit Again
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Storm-Struck Area Is Hit Again
